sections.heading: of advertising visible from main-traveled way; unlawful; when permitted; written lease and permit from Department of Transportation
sections.text: It shall be unlawful for any person to place or cause to be placed any advertising sign, display, or device which is visible from the main-traveled way of the Highway B

sections.heading: 39-1320 to 39-1320.11 constitute a reasonable and valid exercise of the police power which bears a substantial relation to the public health, safety, and general welfare, and are constitutional
sections.text: State v. Mayhew Products Corp., 204 Neb. 266, 281 N.W.2d 783 (1979).
